messages.message: Invalid pixelHeight. pixelHeight must not be 0 for a block compressed formats.
messages.details: pixelHeight is 0 but for block-compressed KHR_DF_MODEL_UASTC it must not be 0.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
